contentrichtext.text: {{TOCright}} '''USC''' is a [[three-letter abbreviation]] that may refer to: ==Education== * [[United Services College]] (Devon, England) * [[University of the Sacred Heart (Puerto Rico)]] or Universidad del Sagrado CorazÃ³n (San Juan, Puerto Rico) * [[Pontifical University of the Holy Cross]] (Rome, Italy) * [[University of San Carlos]] (Cebu City, Philippines) * [[University of Santiago de Compostela]] (Santiago de Compostela, Spain) * [[University of Science and Culture]] (or in Persian:Daneshgah Elm va Farhang) is located in the Tehran, Iran * [[University of South Carolina]] (Columbia, South Carolina, United States) * [[University of Southern California]] (Los Angeles, California, United States) * University of Southern Colorado, renamed in 2003 to [[Colorado State University-Pueblo]] * [[University of the Southern Caribbean]] (Trinidad & Tobago) * [[University of the Sunshine Coast]] (Queensland, Australia) * [[University Senior College]], a year eleven and twelve school in Adelaide, South Australia * [[Upper St. Clair High School]] (Upper St. Clair, Pennsylvania, United States) * [[Utica School of Commerce]] (Three locations in Upstate New York, United States) ==Government== * [[United Nations Security Council]], an organ of the United Nations * [[United Somali Congress]] * [[United States Cabinet]], senior officers and advisors to the President of the United States * [[United States Code]], a compilation and codification of the general and permanent federal Law of the United States * [[United States Congress]], the legislative branch of the federal government of the United States * [[United States Constitution]], the supreme law of the United States of America ==Non-governmental organizations== *[[Unitarian Universalist Service Committee]], also called "Unitarian Service Committee", works to provide disaster relief and promote human rights *[[USC Canada]], the Unitarian Service Committee of Canada ==Law enforcement== * [[Ulster Special Constabulary]], a former reserve police force in Northern Ireland * [[United States Constabulary]], the security force of the U.S. Occupation Zone of West Germany ==Sports== * [[USC Gamecocks]], the athletic program of the University of South Carolina * [[USC Trojans]], the athletic program of the University of Southern California * [[Unity Sporting Club]] (Wenchi, Ghana) ==Other== * [[Heckler & Koch USC]], a firearm * [[Unified Soil Classification System]], a soil classification system used in engineering and geology * [[US Sugar Corporation]], an agricultural business in Florida * [[USC (clothing retailer)]], a clothing retailer in the UK * [[WWE United States Championship]], defended in World Wrestling Entertainment * [[Ubuntu Software Center]], a program for installing and removing software on the Ubuntu operating system {{disambiguation|school}}
